name: 8bit 4way Ninja (Test)
description:
Version 1.3

RETRO Top down - 4 way movement - ninja maze game

Avoid the enemy guards, get all the gold and make your way to the exit

1.2 - Bigger level, on/off style hazards, switch + button, new tiles/assets, various improvements.

1.3 - New tiles/animations, new character, more optimizations.

No sounds/music yet, Just a very basic/rough gameplay test with 1 scene.

Controls are WASD for movement, that's it! (For now...)

ENJOY!

We recommend listening to this music while playing.

- SKYDEVILPALM
